T02D2732:108b-1: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka ku b'akya sto tra n'a ma /
T02D2732:108b-3: thugs rje chen po la smre sngags kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2732:108b-4: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:108b-5: dri med dung mdog mchog tu gzugs bzad pa //
T02D2732:108b-6: rnam dag 'od gsal zla ba'i dkyil bzhin mdzes //
T02D2732:108b-7: ji ltar mkha' la nyi stong 'bar ba bzhin //
T02D2732:108b-8: dba' bo 'od zer tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes //
T02D2732:108b-9: srid pa gsum gyi sa mkhan ston par grags //
T02D2732:108b-10: khams gsum 'gro ba yongs kyi gnyen gcig pu //
T02D2732:108b-11: thugs rje'i lha khyod bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2732:108b-12: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:108b-13: bdag ni thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas //
T02D2732:108b-14: lam stong lam log sred pa'i 'khor bar 'khyams //
T02D2732:108b-15: sngon tshe las log sdig pa byas pas nongs //
T02D2732:108b-16: sdig pa'i las ni ci byas rang gnod 'gyod //
T02D2732:108b-17: dar zhing rgyas pa'i las dbang de btsan pas //
T02D2732:108b-18: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bying gyur te //
T02D2732:108b-19: zhe sdang 'bar ba'i me yis rang rgyud bsregs //
T02D2732:109a-1: mug mun pa chen pos shes rab rmongs //
T02D2732:109a-2: 'dod chags rgya mtsho'i nang du rnam shes bying //
T02D2732:109a-3: nga rgyal mthon po'i ri bos ngan 'gror mnan //
T02D2732:109a-4: phrag dog rlung nag 'tshub mas 'khor bar g-yengs //
T02D2732:109a-5: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa dam pos bcings //
T02D2732:109a-6: 'dod pa me dang 'dra ba'i 'obs su lhung //
T02D2732:109a-7: sdug bsngal drag po'i mda' char drag tu bab //
T02D2732:109a-8: me khams nyi ma'i dug ni steng nas tsha //
T02D2732:109a-9: chu khams yi rlan ni 'og nas grang //
T02D2732:109a-10: phyi rol ser bu'i dad ni mtha' nas tsha //
T02D2732:109a-11: bad kan rlung mkhris nad ni khong nas ldang //
T02D2732:109a-12: de 'dra'i sdug bsngal drag po bzod dka' na'ang //
T02D2732:109a-13: sdom pa'i dam tshig bshig par ga la rung //
T02D2732:109a-14: sdug bsngal kun dang bsngos nas sdom bsrung zhing //
T02D2732:109a-15: mos shing dad pas 'phags mchog mi gtong na //
T02D2732:109a-16: 'phags mchog 'gro don mi mdzad ci la dgongs //
T02D2732:109a-17: byams mgon ci slad bdag la thugs mi brtse //
T02D2732:109a-18: ye shes spyan can khyed kyi spyan snga ru //
T02D2732:109a-19: bdag 'dras smre sngags gsol bar mi rigs kyang //
T02D2732:109a-20: shin tu skrag ba'i smre sngags gsol lags na //
T02D2732:109a-21: thugs rje chen pos bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2732:109a-22: bdag 'dra'i skye bo las ngan sdig po che //
T02D2732:109a-23: las kyi dbang gis snyigs ma'i dus 'dir skyes //
T02D2732:109a-24: skyes pas 'gyod kyang las dbang bcos su med //
T02D2732:109a-25: las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i rgyun dang 'dra //
T02D2732:109a-26: las dbang chu rgyun 'phral la ga la zlog //
T02D2732:109a-27: bka' la zhugs kyang bka' bzhin rngo ma thogs //
T02D2732:109a-28: lus ngag yid gsum sdig pa'i dbang du thal //
T02D2732:109a-29: las kyi 'bras bu ngan pas shin tu bsregs //
T02D2732:109a-30: las dbang sreg pa'i me ni rab 'bar zhing //
T02D2732:109a-31: rnam shes dbang po'i myu gu gdungs gyur na //
T02D2732:109a-32: phung po sgyu ma'i lus kyis mi bzod pas //
T02D2732:109a-33: byams mgon thugs rje can gyis bzod lags sam //
T02D2732:109a-34: ye shes spyan can khyed kyi spyan snga ru //
T02D2732:109a-35: sdig pa'i rnam grangs ma lus mthol bshags na //
T02D2732:109a-36: thugs rje chen pos dag par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2732:109a-37: da nas bzung nas sdig pa mi bgyid spong //
T02D2732:109a-38: bka' yi don lam don sum phyogs par bgyid //
T02D2732:109a-39: rnam yang sdig pa'i dbang du ma gyur cig / nyi ltar 'od gsal zla ltar 'od mdangs pa //
T02D2732:109a-40: thugs rje chen po'i zhal mthong 'tshal lags na //
T02D2732:109a-41: thog ma med nas ma rig ling thog gis //
T02D2732:109b-0: bsgribs shing nongs pa'i @109b mig gis ma mthong na //
T02D2732:109b-1: 'gro ba'i mgon khyod da lta gang na bzhugs //
T02D2732:109b-2: sdug bsngal drag po shin tu mi bzad pas //
T02D2732:109b-3: shin tu bsregs pas skyi g-ya' rab 'jigs shing //
T02D2732:109b-4: da dung gdung ba'i smre sngags nyid 'don na //
T02D2732:109b-5: nyam thag phongs pa'i nga ros 'o 'dod 'bod //
T02D2732:109b-6: byams mgon thugs rje can gyis gsan lags sam //
T02D2732:109b-7: phongs pa gang gis nga yi mtshan thos na //
T02D2732:109b-8: de yi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya'o zhes //
T02D2732:109b-9: 'gro la nyid kyi thugs rjes zhal bzhes nas //
T02D2732:109b-10: bdag cag 'gro ba sems can thams cad la //
T02D2732:109b-11: dug lda dug gsum nad kyis gzir lags na //
T02D2732:109b-12: mi bzad nad ni thugs rjes zhi bar 'dod //
T02D2732:109b-13: thugs rje'i thugs kyis bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2732:109b-14: thugs rje'i spyan gyis bdag la gzigs su gsol //
T02D2732:109b-15: thugs rje'i gsung gis bdag la sgrogs su gsol //
T02D2732:109b-16: bdag ni shi 'phos lus sems brjes pa'i tshe //
T02D2732:109b-17: gnyen bshes grogs dang bral nas gshin rjes khrid //
T02D2732:109b-18: de dus 'jig rten nye dus mi phan pas //
T02D2732:109b-19: las kyis mnar bas bdag rang gcig pur 'khyam //
T02D2732:109b-20: de dus bdag la mgon skyabs ma mchis na //
T02D2732:109b-21: thugs rje chen pos mgon skyabs mdzad du gsol //
T02D2732:109b-22: las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo bdag 'dra ba //
T02D2732:109b-23: thog ma med nas phyin ci log rtogs bas //
T02D2732:109b-24: khams gsum 'khor ba'i 'dam las ma thar te //
T02D2732:109b-25: bskal pa dpag med skye ba grangs med du //
T02D2732:109b-26: gdos bcas lus blangs skye ba dpag med zhig / sha rus bsags na 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam //
T02D2732:109b-27: rnag khrag bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam //
T02D2732:109b-28: las 'phro bsags na mtha' yas brjod mi lang //
T02D2732:109b-29: khams gsum bgrangs shing skye ba'i kha brgyud kyang //
T02D2732:109b-30: byas pa'i las rnams don med chud re gsan //
T02D2732:109b-31: bka' yi gtan tshigs zab mo ma khrol cing //
T02D2732:109b-32: shes rab zab mo'i mig bu ma bye bas //
T02D2732:109b-33: srid pa'i yo byad gtong bar ma phod cing //
T02D2732:109b-34: phung po sgyu ma'i lus la chags shing zhen //
T02D2732:109b-35: las kyi dbang btsan nyon mongs stobs che bas //
T02D2732:109b-36: sha khrag dra ba'i lus blangs 'khor bar 'khyams //
T02D2732:109b-37: sdug bsngal drag po srid pa'i btson rar tshud //
T02D2732:109b-38: mi bzad sdug bsngal drag po 'di 'dra na //
T02D2732:109b-39: nyes pa thams cad rang gi las las byung //
T02D2732:109b-40: thugs rje chen pos las dan rgyun bcad de //
T02D2732:110a-1: kyi rgyun ni bzlog tu gsol //
T02D2732:110a-2: nyon mongs las kyi rgyun ni dbang btsan pas //
T02D2732:110a-3: ma rig mun pa'i nang du gtan 'khyams te //
T02D2732:110a-4: ye shes nyi ma'i 'od kyis bsal du gsol //
T02D2732:110a-5: nyes byas las kyi 'bras bu mi bzad na //
T02D2732:110a-6: thugs rje chen pos phrin las mdzad du gsol //
T02D2732:110a-7: dug gsum sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir lags na //
T02D2732:110a-8: thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis gso bar gsol //
T02D2732:110a-9: phyin ci log gi g-yang sar lhung lags na //
T02D2732:110a-10: myur mgyogs thugs rje'i phyag gis gzung du gsol //
T02D2732:110a-11: srid pa'i chu bos bdag cag khyer lags na //
T02D2732:110a-12: zag med ye shes gru yis bsgral du gsol//
T02D2732:110a-13: rgyal ba'i mtshan brjod yon tan bsam mi khyab //
T02D2732:110a-14: yon tan gzhung las ji ltar byung ba bzhin //
T02D2732:110a-15: ma lus bdag la myur du stsal du gsol //
T02D2732:110a-16: rgyal ba'i thugs kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
T02D2732:110a-17: phyag 'tshal bstod dang sdig bshags smre gsol dang //
T02D2732:110a-18: dge ba'i las ni cung zad bsags pa//
T02D2732:110a-19: thams cad bla med byang chub chen por bsngo //
T02D2732:110a-20: mi dmigs bsngo dang gsol btab smon lam dang //
T02D2732:110a-21: spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02D2732:110a-22: zhing rab dam pa'i gnas su skye bar shog //
T02D2732:110a-23: zhing rab dam pa'i gnas su skyes nas kyang //
T02D2732:110a-24: rgyal ba sras bcas zhal mthong gsung thos shog / thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:110a-25: mchod pa'i yo byad bdag la ma mchis pas //
T02D2732:110a-26: smre sngags chen pos khyed la gsol 'debs na //
T02D2732:110a-27: mchog gi dngos grub ma lus stsal du gsol //
T02D2732:110a-28: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:110a-29: gang dang gang la mgon dang skyabs med pa //
T02D2732:110a-30: de dang de yi mgon skyabs zhal bzhes na //
T02D2732:110a-31: skyabs med sdig can rnams la bskyab tu gsol //
T02D2732:110a-32: skyabs med tshe 'das rnams la bskyab tu gsol //
T02D2732:110a-33: skyabs med 'khor bar 'khyams la bskyab tu gsol //
T02D2732:110a-34: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:110a-35: nyin re bzhin du sdig pa zil gyis non //
T02D2732:110a-36: las ngan sgrib pa ci mchis bsal du gsol //
T02D2732:110a-37: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:110a-38: bdag ni nyon mongs dbang du mi 'gro bar //
T02D2732:110a-39: sdig pa'i las ni gang yang me byed cing //
T02D2732:110a-40: nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod pa ru //
T02D2732:110b-0: thugs rje chen pos byin gyis @110b brlab tu gsol //
T02D2732:110b-1: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:110b-2: mtshan nas brjod pa tsam gyis sdug bsngal rnams //
T02D2732:110b-3: zhi bar mdzad pa khyed dang mjal gyur na //
T02D2732:110b-4: bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na //
T02D2732:110b-5: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:110b-6: khyed kyi gzungs sngags brjod pa'i phan yon nam //
T02D2732:110b-7: yon tan gzung las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin //
T02D2732:110b-8: ma lus bdag la myur du stsal du gsol //
T02D2732:110b-9: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:110b-10: bdag gis khyed bsgoms snying po bzlas pa dang //
T02D2732:110b-11: phyag 'tshal bstod dang sdig bshags smre gsol bas //
T02D2732:110b-12: mgon po khyed kyi mthong gsung thos nas //
T02D2732:110b-13: khyed kyi go 'phang myur du thob nas kyang //
T02D2732:110b-14: bdag kyang khyed ltar 'gro don byed par shog //
T02D2732:110b-15: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:110b-16: ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe //
T02D2732:110b-17: de srid bdag gi lus skyed pas //
T02D2732:110b-18: lus kyis mgon po mchod byed cing //
T02D2732:110b-19: lus kyi tshogs ni rdzogs par shog / thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:110b-20: ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe //
T02D2732:110b-21: de srid bdag gi ngag skyed pas //
T02D2732:110b-22: ngag gis mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing //
T02D2732:110b-23: ngag gi tshogs ni rdzogs par shog / thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:110b-24: ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe //
T02D2732:110b-25: de srid bdag gi yid skyed pas //
T02D2732:110b-26: yid kyis mgon po rjes dran zhing //
T02D2732:110b-27: yid kyi tshogs ni rdzogs par shog / de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyis //
T02D2732:110b-28: thugs rje'i dbang phyug bsten bgyis pas //
T02D2732:110b-29: lus ngag yid gsum skyon bral nas //
T02D2732:110b-30: yon tan phun sum tshogs par shog /
T02D2732:110b-31: de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi //
T02D2732:110b-32: thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs //
T02D2732:110b-33: rtag tu dad gus bgyis pa na //
T02D2732:110b-34: thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2732:110b-35: srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po //
T02D2732:110b-36: yon tan bsam gyi mi khyab pa //
T02D2732:110b-38: srid gsum re ba rdzogs par shog //
T02D2732:110b-40: srid pa gsum gyi sems can la //
T02D2732:110b-41: dngos sam brgyud pas phan thogs shog //
T02D2732:110b-42: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la /
